name: Country Dropdown For Contact Form 7
author: howdytheme

sections.description:
Country Dropdown For Contact Form 7 making Country field to you conact form. Via this plugin You can be make your contact form 7 to more professional.

You may create a country drop-down list with country flags using Country Field Contact Form 7. In the usual drop-down field of the contact form 7, the tag field will automatically add the names of the countries.

Documentation
Live Demo
Get Premium

FEATURES:

  • Easy use
  • With Country Flag Icon
  • Navigate the country dropdown by typing a country’s name, or using up/down keys
  • Default Country Setup
  • Mobile Friedly
  • setting id and class of the country dropdown field (optional)

FEATURES FOR PREMIUM:

  • Show Dropdown in specific country
  • can be setup particular country at top
  • Hide/ remove country
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have Contact Form 7 installed.
  2. Download the file to install and activate.
  3. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
